scope: Day 11 bottleneck analysis + alert threshold tuning

actions.partitioning: Increase partitions only if queue depth trend > 70% for sustained window.
actions.batch_size: Tune batch size incrementally by +10% with p95/p99 verification.
actions.retry_policy: Use exponential backoff and cap retries to prevent retry storms.
actions.timeouts: Set client timeout above p99 + safety margin; avoid too-aggressive timeout.
actions.connection_pool: Increase pool size when concurrency rises and queue depth persists.

alert_tuning.goal: Reduce false positives while preserving safety guardrails
